TopicTitle: The Official HypeTrain 0.90 Voyage Thread (Experimentals! Choo Choo Dangit!)

Articles.Content: cant wait for this! running a space program from a camper... XD

Time to fuel the engine! Bob Fitch has taken a quick look at the select new root part feature in 0.90:

PLAYTHROUGHS ARE HERE!!

We're getting closer!!!

Edited December 8, 2014 by Engineer Of Stuff

Dunno if you need 'em for the HypeTrain, but I've brought some boosters. I, um, picked them out of Kerbodyne's trash bin, but they seem to work okay. Kinda launched a few willing Kerbals quite high into the air.

PLAYTHROUGHS ARE HERE!!

We're getting closer!!!

Playthroughs aren't here just yet
When the RC gets here, the Hype Train will really take off.

When the RC gets here, the Hype Train will really take off.

A) You're forgetting the HypeShuttle, HypePlane and YOUR Hypevehicle, the HypeBlimp!

It's the Q & A, once that's up the forum explodes with posts; one time I posted an almost instant reply to a post and it was stranded 1 1/2 pages away!!
I tend not to get too hyped before the 502's start.

I tend not to get too hyped before the 502's start.

I just got 2???
We got a problem! The engines can only can to 9000%! We need more power,we need the new BUILDING TIERS!
Is it too late for me to board the HypeTrain?

Is it too late for me to board the HypeTrain?

It's never too late! Unless it gets full, but in that case you can just cling onto the outside!

Also, Gregox, in the OP it says female kerbals not confirmed for 0.90. Does this mean they are confirmed but just later on?
They were confirmed a while back. Or at least said to be in development.

Then may I please have a ticket/cookie? I'll donate a few solar panels from my experimental satellites. I have a lot of those. I'll also donate the vertical rudder of a failed plane prototype. It may or may not be the reason it's a failed prototype, though.

They were confirmed a while back. Or at least said to be in development.

Oh i must have missed that, Thanks

I tend not to get too hyped before the 502's start.

Do not mention the forbidden name! I've never gotten 502 errors until someone mentions them! YOU JUST CURSED ME!!!

It's never too late! Unless it gets full, but in that case you can just cling onto the outside!

Also, Gregox, in the OP it says female kerbals not confirmed for 0.90. Does this mean they are confirmed but just later on?

Yeah, female Kerbals have been confirmed by Maxmaps a while back and several times.

Dunno if you need 'em for the HypeTrain, but I've brought some boosters. I, um, picked them out of Kerbodyne's trash bin, but they seem to work okay. Kinda launched a few willing Kerbals quite high into the air.

These shall be useful. Hop on the next station and put 'em on the Brakevan. That ought to do it.

These shall be useful. Hop on the next station and put 'em on the Brakevan. That ought to do it.

We don't need a Brakevan. This is the HYPETRAIN.

(Oh, and I just remembered the pizza thing from the last time )

We don't need a Brakevan. This is the HYPETRAIN.

(Oh, and I just remembered the pizza thing from the last time )

IIRC, the pizza thing was .24, right?

IIRC, the pizza thing was .24, right?

Yeah, a whole bunch of forum people wanted to get SQUAD some pizzas.

Did it ever work? Does anyone remember?

Yeah, a whole bunch of forum people wanted to get SQUAD some pizzas.

Did it ever work? Does anyone remember?

I think they told people to donate it to a charity. Here is the thread

Here's the HypeTrain playlist for 0.90.0 A bit more sparse, more specificity than the general "upbeat" songs the previous list had.

And by specificity I mean trains. And rockets. And spaceships.

Edited December 9, 2014 by GregroxMun

I think they told people to donate it to a charity. Here is the thread

yea that's exactly what happened. i ended up donating to http://www.childsplaycharity.org/donate

yea that's exactly what happened. i ended up donating to http://www.childsplaycharity.org/donate

Thats what I love about this community. Our noble ideas usually end up turning into more noble ones.

Boosters are strapped to the brakevan as requested, although I had to get a bit inventive with the attachment methods. 25 boosters should be an interesting way to get a little extra push out of the HypeTrain.

And yes, I'm excited for 0.90. MK3 looks like it'll make good airliner parts, though I'm not likely to be satisfied with the parts until I have IVA's. I like flying from in the pilot's seat, not a flying camera.

Then again, I've always kinda been the crazy plane pilot, trying to push my own limits.
